          <title>
            <string language="hu">Kanyarodó autóbuszban a kanyar külső íve felé dőlünk</string>
            <string language="en">We fall into the outer arc of the turning bus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir fallen in den äußeren Bogen des 
drehenbusses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous tombons dans l'arc externe du bus de 
rotation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós caímos no arco exterior da barra-ônibus de
giro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cadiamo nell'arco esterno del bus di rotazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιερχόμαστε στο εξωτερικό τόξο του διαδρόμου 
στροφής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caemos en el arco externo del megabus que da 
vuelta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Testek tehetetlenségének megnyilvánulása</string>
            <string language="en">The inertia of the bodies</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">tehetetlenség,  </string>
            <string language="en">inertia,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schwungkraft der Körper</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'inertie des corps</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A inércia dos corpos</string>

          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La inercia de los cuerpos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwungkraft,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inertie,</string>
